org.jcvi.jillion.sam

Class SamRecordBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.sam.SamRecordBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SamAttributed

    public class SamRecordBuilder
extends Object
implements SamAttributed
    Builder object to build new instances of SamRecords.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SamRecordBuilder(SamHeader header)
      Create an new Builder object for a SamRecord that will use the given SamHeader.
      SamRecordBuilder(SamHeader header, SamAttributeValidator attributeValidator)
      Create an new Builder object for a SamRecord that will use the given SamHeader and the given SamAttributeValidator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SamRecordBuilder

        public SamRecordBuilder(SamHeader header)
        Create an new Builder object for a SamRecord that will use the given SamHeader. The reference(s) this record maps to as well as any read groups or custom tags referred to by this record must be defined by this header.
        Parameters:
        header - The SamHeader to use; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if header is null.

      • SamRecordBuilder

        public SamRecordBuilder(SamHeader header,
                        SamAttributeValidator attributeValidator)
        Create an new Builder object for a SamRecord that will use the given SamHeader and the given SamAttributeValidator. The reference(s) this record maps to as well as any read groups or custom tags referred to by this record must be defined by this header.
        Parameters:
        header - The SamHeader to use; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if header is null.

    • Method Detail

      • addAttribute

        public SamRecordBuilder addAttribute(SamAttribute attribute)
                              throws InvalidAttributeException
        Add the given attribute to this record.
        Parameters:
        attribute - the attribute to add; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if attribute is null.
        InvalidAttributeException - if the attribute fails the given SamAttributeValidator.
        See Also:
        removeAttribute(SamAttributeKey)

      • removeAttribute

        public SamRecordBuilder removeAttribute(SamAttributeKey attributeKey)
        Remove the attribute with the given SamAttributeKey. If this record does not have an attribute with the attribute key, then this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        attributeKey - the key to remove; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if attributeKey is null.

      • setQueryName

        public SamRecordBuilder setQueryName(String queryName)
        Sets the query template name. Reads/segments having identical query name are regarded to come from the same template. If this method is not called, then the query name will be set to SamRecord.UNAVAILABLE.
        Parameters:
        queryName - the query name to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if queryName is null.

      • setReferenceName

        public SamRecordBuilder setReferenceName(String referenceName)
        Set the reference name that this segment aligns to. If this field is not set to SamRecord.UNAVAILABLE, then the reference SamHeader.getReferenceSequence(String) must return a non-null value. If this method is not called, then the value will default to null.
        Parameters:
        referenceName - the reference name this segment aligns; can not be null and must either be SamRecord.UNAVAILABLE or a reference sequence name that is in the provided SamHeader.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if referenceName is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if referenceName is not SamRecord.UNAVAILABLE and is not in the provided SamHeader.

      • setNextReferenceName

        public SamRecordBuilder setNextReferenceName(String nextReferenceName)
        Set the reference sequence name of the primary alignment of the NEXT read in the template. If nextReferenceName is not SamRecord.UNAVAILABLE or SamRecord.IDENTICAL then the reference SamHeader.getReferenceSequence(String) must return a non-null value. If nextReferenceName is not SamRecord.IDENTICAL and the next read in the template SamRecord.isPrimary(), then this field is identical to SamRecord.getReferenceName() of the next read.
        Parameters:
        nextReferenceName - the next reference name; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if reference name is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if referenceName is not SamRecord.UNAVAILABLE or SamRecord.IDENTICAL and is not in the provided SamHeader.

      • setFlags

        public SamRecordBuilder setFlags(int flags)
        Set the SamRecordFlags of this record This method call is required. This method call makes a defensive copy of the input Set.
        Parameters:
        flags - the SamRecordFlags relevant to this record; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this;
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if flags is null.

      • setFlags

        public SamRecordBuilder setFlags(Set<SamRecordFlag> flags)
        Set the SamRecordFlags of this record This method call is required. This method call makes a defensive copy of the input Set.
        Parameters:
        flags - the SamRecordFlags relevant to this record; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this;
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if flags is null.

      • setStartPosition

        public SamRecordBuilder setStartPosition(int startPosition)
        Set the start position on the reference (1-based) of the first matching base of this segment. The first valid start position is therefore 1, a value of 0 means the segment did not map.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - the start position; must be >=0. If this method is not called, then the default start position of 0 is used.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if startPosition is <0.

      • setNextPosition

        public SamRecordBuilder setNextPosition(int nextPosition)
        Set the start position on the reference (1-based) of the matching base of the NEXT read in the template. This value should match the SamRecord.getStartPosition() of the primary line of the next read.
        Parameters:
        nextPosition - the start position; must be >=0. If this method is not called, then the default nextPosition of 0 is used.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if startPosition is <0.

      • setMappingQuality

        public SamRecordBuilder setMappingQuality(int mappingQuality)
        Convenience method to set mapping quality as an int instead of a byte. Otherwise same as setMappingQuality(byte).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if mappingQuality is out of byte range.

      • setMappingQuality

        public SamRecordBuilder setMappingQuality(byte mappingQuality)
        The mapping quality. It equals -10 log10 Prob{mapping position is wrong} rounded to the nearest integer. If set to -1, then the mapping is unavailable. Valid values are -1.. Byte.MAX_VALUE. If this method is not called, then the default value of -1 will be used.
        Parameters:
        mappingQuality - the mapping quality to set; must be >= -1.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if mapping quality < -1.

      • setCigar

        public SamRecordBuilder setCigar(Cigar cigar)
        Sets the Cigar value. If the Cigar is not available, then this value should be set to null.
        Parameters:
        cigar - the Cigar; or null.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setSequence

        public SamRecordBuilder setSequence(NucleotideSequence sequence)
        The segment NucleotideSequence. If the sequence is not stored, then this value should be null. If this sequence exists, then the sequence length must equal the length of the Cigar.
        Parameters:
        sequence - the sequence, may be null.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setQualities

        public SamRecordBuilder setQualities(QualitySequence qualities)
        The QualitySequence of this segment. If the qualities are not stored, then this value should be null. If not null, then then this segment's NucleotideSequence must also not be null and have an equal length.
        Parameters:
        qualities - the QualitySequence for this record; may be null if the qualities are not known.
        Returns:
        this.
        See Also:
        setSequence(NucleotideSequence)

      • setObservedTemplateLength

        public SamRecordBuilder setObservedTemplateLength(int observedTemplateLength)
        Signed observed template length. If all segments are mapped to the same reference, the unsigned observed template length equals the number of bases from the leftmost mapped base to the rightmost mapped base. The leftmost segment has a plus sign and the rightmost has a minus sign. The sign of segments in the middle is undefined. It is set as 0 for single-segment template or when the information is unavailable. If this method is not called, then the default value is 0.
        Parameters:
        observedTemplateLength - the observed template length.
        Returns:
        this.
